model_answer: The speaker's stance evolves from emphasizing hard work and discipline to recognizing the importance of passion, creativity, and immersion. He also stresses the importance of creativity in addition to passion and immersion. Finally, he calls for an open-mindedness and care to build a better world, indicating a broader perspective on success. The visuals used throughout the talk complement this evolution in the speaker's stance.

The speaker discusses how immersion led to a playful, creative fix for a wasteful library door and later applied it to improv theater.
